cards.content: Tap time/temp to edit. Tap days to toggle.

cards.title: EV9 Integration Guide
cards.content:
This dashboard integrates your **2024 Kia EV9** with Home Assistant via the kia_uvo integration.

All data comes from **Kia Connect** (same as your mobile app). Commands go through Kia's cloud servers.

**Rate Limits**: Kia limits API calls. Data refreshes ~30 min. Use Refresh sparingly.

cards.title: Metrics Explained
cards.content:
### Battery & Range

| Metric | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| **Battery %** | High-voltage traction battery charge |
| **EV Range** | Estimated miles based on charge & driving |
| **12V Battery** | Auxiliary battery (powers electronics) |

### Charging Metrics

| Metric | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| **Charging Power** | Current kW. L1=1.2-1.4kW, L2=up to 11kW |
| **Expected Power** | Your configured expected rate |
| **AC/DC Limit** | Max charge %. Set 80% daily to preserve battery |

### Why Charging Varies
- Temperature (hot/cold reduces rate)
- Near full (tapers above 80%)
- EVSE limitation
- 12V battery health
- Vehicle software limits

cards.title: Walk-Away Lock
cards.content:
### How It Works

Uses **GPS location only** (NOT phone Bluetooth or key fob).

When  leaves your Home zone:
1. Waits configured delay (default 2 min)
2. Re-checks car is still unlocked AND outside home
3. Locks automatically
4. Sends notification

**Note**: This is location-based, not proximity-based. Different from the car's built-in walk-away lock.

cards.title: Charging Alerts
cards.content:
### Charging Interrupted Alert

Triggers when:
- Charging stops while plugged in
- Battery below 95%
- Between 8PM-7AM
- Persists for configured delay

**Common causes**: Breaker trip, GFCI trip, EVSE fault, temperature

### Low Charging Power Alert

Triggers when:
- Power below your threshold
- Stays low 5+ minutes
- Battery below 80%

Set your expected power based on your charger:
- L1 120V/12A: ~1.3kW
- L1 120V/16A: ~1.6kW
- L2 240V: 7-11kW

cards.title: Pre-conditioning Schedules
cards.content:
### How the New Schedule System Works

You have **5 independent schedules** instead of fixed per-day times:

**Example:**
- **Schedule 1**: Mon-Fri at 7:30 AM (workday commute)
- **Schedule 2**: Sat-Sun at 10:00 AM (weekend)
- **Schedule 3**: Wed at 6:00 PM (weekly activity)

### How It Works

1. Automation checks every minute
2. Loops through schedules 1-5 (priority order)
3. For each: checks enabled + day selected + time match
4. **First matching schedule wins**

### Smart Mode

When enabled, adds extra lead time based on weather:
- Calculates temp difference from target
- Adds ~1 min per 3°F difference
- Maximum +20 minutes extra

cards.title: Troubleshooting
cards.content:
### Commands Not Working?
1. Check Kia Connect app - can you control from there?
2. Press Refresh and wait 2-3 min
3. Check HA logs (filter 'kia_uvo')
4. Wait 30+ min if you sent many commands

### Data Not Updating?
- Normal refresh is every 30 min
- Use Force Update sparingly
- Check Kia Connect subscription

### Walk-Away Lock Not Triggering?
- Verify device_tracker is updating
- Check car actually left Home zone
- Verify delay isn't too long
- Check car was unlocked when leaving
